channel.title: New quick question
channel.description:
ok in my server whenever someone is a higher combat level than me my left mouse sais trade I want it to alway's say atack and not trade how do I fix this.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2007, 10:18:58 PM[/size][hr]ok this is what I mean this picture is the higher cb showing how it sais atk and the other one is the lower cb lvl showing it saying trade I want it to say atk no matter what cb for everybody how do I do that. [IMG]http://i190.photobucket.com/albums/z106/ugetpkd_2008/PIRE.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i190.photobucket.com/albums/z106/ugetpkd_2008/PIMP.jpg[/img]

item.title: New quick question
item.dc:creator: @ugetpkd ugetpkd
item.description:
@ugetpkd wrote:

[code]outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(4); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu
outStream.writeString(“Trade with”);
outStream.endFrameVarSize();

	outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
	outStream.writeByteC(2);		// command slot
	outStream.writeByteA(0);		// 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu
	outStream.writeString("Follow");
	outStream.endFrameVarSize();

		outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
		outStream.writeByteC(3);		// command slot (does it matter which one?)
		outStream.writeByteA(1);		// 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu
		outStream.writeString("Attack");
		outStream.endFrameVarSize();
		IsInWilderness = true;

[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2007, 10:56:36 PM[/size][hr]

edit testing.

Read full topic

item.title: New quick question
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

I’m not 100% sure if I fixed it on my server, as I have no been able to test it, but look for this and replace it with mine.

[code]outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(4); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu
outStream.writeString(“Trade with”);
outStream.endFrameVarSize();

	outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
	outStream.writeByteC(2);		// command slot
	outStream.writeByteA(0);		// 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu
	outStream.writeString("Follow");
	outStream.endFrameVarSize();

		outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
		outStream.writeByteC(3);		// command slot (does it matter which one?)
		outStream.writeByteA(1);		// 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu
		outStream.writeString("Attack");
		outStream.endFrameVarSize();
		IsInWilderness = true;[/code]

Read full topic
